name: Breakable
description: Can be suppressed by Mold Breaker and similar abilities.

name: Cannot Suppress
description: Cannot be suppressed by any means.

name: Fails Role Play
description: Cannot be copied by Role Play.

name: Fails Skill Swap
description: Cannot be swapped with Skill Swap.

name: No Entrainment
description: Cannot be given to another Pokemon via Entrainment.

name: No Receiver
description: Cannot be received by Receiver ability.

name: No Transform
description: Not copied when a Pokemon transforms.
